page_analysis.text_content:
Light well & stairwell standards
& site planning

Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

Interior lot example

Rear yard

Buildable area
3'max
width

width

Main dwelling

Key
Curb
lot line
Sidewalk
Required
setbacks
Buildable
area

Dwelling

Lightwells
& stairwells
Lightwells
& stairwells
that encroach
into the req
yards

Front yard

3' min.
from lot
line (typ.)

3' max.
into side
yard (typ.)

Lightwells & stairwells
• a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
• a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of
the perimeter of the basement

Note: measurements are based on interior dimension of
opening and exclude encasing structure.

• Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.

• Maximum width (interior dimension) is 3'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

• Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max (however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line).

• Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

• The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'.

• Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.

• Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

42

visual_elements.description: Site plan diagram showing an interior lot example with a main dwelling, buildable area, required setbacks, and light wells/stairwells. The diagram includes dimensional annotations showing 3' maximum widths, encroachment distances, and yard areas. Features are labeled with letters a, b, c, and d to reference different light well and stairwell elements.
visual_elements.location: Right side of page, taking up approximately 60% of the page width

visual_elements.description: Key showing different line types and shading patterns used in the diagram, including curb lot line, sidewalk, required setbacks, buildable area, dwelling, lightwells & stairwells, and lightwells & stairwells that encroach into required yards
visual_elements.location: Bottom right corner of the diagram

technical_specifications.parameter: Combined length of all excavated features
Allowable encroachment into required side yard
Minimum distance from side lot line
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard

structural_elements.main_heading: Light well & stairwell standards & site planning
sections: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

additional_notes: Page number 42 appears at bottom left
Diagram uses different shading and line patterns to distinguish between various elements
Measurements in diagram are clearly labeled with dimensional lines and arrows
cross_references: Fig 39 Examples of site plan w/light wells & stairwells

qualifiers.text: interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure
however feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line
on all sides of the structure
measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure

conditions.text: The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter
Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard
Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max
Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'

The combined length (interior dimensions of the opening excluding encasing structure) of all the excavated features or portions of features that encroach into the required yards, on all sides of the structure, may not exceed 15'
a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'
a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement
Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees
Public Works Department must approve drainage system

logical_relationships.expression: All basic dimensional and location requirements must be met
Encroachment limits for both side and rear yards must be respected
Combined length restrictions for both encroaching and all features must be satisfied
Environmental and approval requirements must be met

execution_sequence.action: Verify maximum width does not exceed 3 feet interior dimension
Confirm features are not located on front yard side of structure
Calculate combined length of all excavated features and verify does not exceed 30% of basement perimeter
Verify side yard encroachment does not exceed 3 feet and maintains minimum 3 feet from lot line
Verify rear yard encroachment does not exceed 4 feet
Calculate combined length of encroaching features on all sides and verify does not exceed 15 feet
Verify diagram measurements for encroaching features (a+b) do not exceed 15 feet
Verify diagram measurements for all features (a+b+c+d) do not exceed 30% of basement perimeter
Assess impact on neighboring trees and ensure no harm
Obtain Public Works Department approval for drainage system
